definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: disc or cake of bread;—abs. ´[[ע]] Ho 7:8, 1Ki 17:13, cstr. [[עֻגַת]] 1Ki 19:6, Ez Eze 4:12; pl. [[עֻגוֹת]] Ge 18:6, Nu 11:8; cstr. [[עֻגׁת]] Ex 12:39; —bread-cake, made of [[קֶמַח סׂלֶת]] Ge 18:6 (J), of [[קֶמַח]] 1Ki 17:13, of manna Nu 11:8 (JE; vb. [[בִּשֵּׁל]]), of barley Ez Eze 41:2 (sim.); unleavened, [[עֻגׁת מַצּוֹת]] Ex 12:39 (E; vb. [[אָפָת]]); [[רְחָפִים]] ´[[ע]] 1Ki 19:6 cake of hot-stones i.e. baked on them; metaph. [[כְּלִי הֲפוּכָה]] ´[[ע]] Ho 7:8 Ephr. is a cake not turned (i.e. burnt, ruined).—On ´[[ע]] v. Benz:Arch. 85 f. Now:Arch. i. 111 Kennedy:Ency. Bib. BREAD and synonyms, Ib.:CAKE.
